meaning_str.bing:
n. 胡椒粉；甜椒；柿子椒；灯笼椒
v. （在食物上）撒胡椒粉
网络. 辣椒；辣椒粉；花椒

胡椒粉；甜椒；柿子椒；灯笼椒

胡椒；辣椒；甜椒；灯笼椒；柿子椒；[植物学]胡椒属植物
加胡椒调味；密集地攻击；猛烈抨击；连续不断地提问；连续不断地提出批评

1.en: The child sits in front of his desk again, opens the drawer, and searches for that faint allusion embodied by the cayenne pepper.
1.cn: 孩子坐回他的书桌前，打开那层抽屉，寻找着记忆中的那份朦胧。

2.en: It plans to pepper some of America's fastest-growing states with Fresh & Easy local groceries at a rate of three a week.
2.cn: 它还准备以每周3个的频率在美国增长最快的某些州大量建设新易杂货店。

3.en: But the next, she would pepper me with questions about how the submarines really worked and if they really had a chance.
3.cn: 过了一天，她又缠着我问诸如潜艇是怎么工作的，他们有没有机会找到飞机的残骸这一类的问题。

1.en: Do you have allergies? No. Is there too much pepper on your salad? I don't put pepper on salads.
1.cn: 你有过敏症吗？没有。你在沙拉上放太多胡椒粉了吗？我没在沙拉上加胡椒粉。

2.en: Next we need a teaspoon of pepper, which, I believe, was also the name of your childhood dog.
2.cn: 接下来我们需要一茶匙的胡椒，你小时候养的狗也正好叫胡椒。

3.en: Now the seasoning, light soy sauce and a pinch of ground white pepper.
3.cn: 现在开始调味，加点生抽和一点白胡椒粉。

4.en: And then a little bit of pepper, just a little bit. Then in with the meat.
4.cn: 之后加入一点胡椒粉，一点就好。然后加入牛肉。

5.en: Finally, some white and black pepper and a pinch of salt. Now mix that up.
5.cn: 最后，再加入一些黑白胡椒粉和少许盐，把它们搅拌均匀。

6.en: I'm just going to season it now with a little bit of light soy sauce, a bit of ground black pepper.
6.cn: 现在我要加调味料，一点生抽，一点黑胡椒粉。

7.en: The minced prawns are bound together with salt, powdered chicken stock, potato flour and ground white pepper.
7.cn: 剁碎的虾仁加盐、鸡汤粉、土豆粉和白胡椒粉拌在一起。

8.en: Gives it great fragrance and aroma, just lifts the whole dish. Maybe a little bit of ground white pepper as well.
8.cn: 它有很棒的香味，会让整道菜香气扑鼻。然后再加一点儿白胡椒粉。

9.en: Also, got these great salt and pepper shakers from the restaurant. That's not cool. Dude, none of this is cool.
9.cn: 还有，我从餐厅里拿了这些盐巴胡椒罐。这不好。兄弟，这一切都不好。

10.en: Pinch of sea salt, some ground white pepper, some chopped spring onions, and about four cloves of chopped garlic. In with some grated ginger for some heat.
10.cn: 加少许海盐，一些白胡椒粉，一些葱花，还有约四瓣蒜末，再加些姜末，增加点辣味。

11.en: Enrico's wife said the best way of cooking the fish is frying it, so we've seasoned it, little bit of salt, little bit of pepper, looking pretty good, to be honest.
11.cn: 恩里克的妻子说做鱼的最好方式是煎，我们已经弄熟了，放点盐，加点胡椒，说真的，看上去很不错 。

12.en: There's pineapple shrimp and lemon shrimp, coconut shrimp, pepper shrimp, shrimp soup, shrimp stew, shrimp salad, shrimp in potatoes, shrimp burger, shrimp sandwich. That's about it.
12.cn: 还有菠萝虾、柠檬虾、椰子虾、胡椒虾、鲜虾汤、油焖虾、虾肉色拉、土豆虾、虾肉汉堡包、虾肉三明治。还有…差不多就这些了。

13.en: They did it at Pepper's New Year's Steve party.
13.cn: 他们在胡娇家的新年史蒂夫派对上也是这样。

14.en: After dinner, me, her, and Pepper all fell asleep in front of the fire.
14.cn: 晚饭后，我们两个和辣椒，在炉火前面睡着了。

15.en: He runs more of the business than anyone besides Pepper. Top of the line. Yes.
15.cn: 他掌管的事务比谁都多，除了佩珀，堪称一流。是啊。

16.en: Throw in the chillies. A few of those. Couple of teaspoons of the Sichuan pepper.
16.cn: 加入辣椒，少许即可。几茶匙四川花椒。

17.en: Oh! Beautiful. Okay. She looks like Pepper's pomeranian. We have to say something.
17.cn: 真漂亮。她看起来就像胡娇家的小博美，我们得说说她。

18.en: Or, at least what I thought was a log. Oh my God. You threw Pepper on the fire. I wish.
18.cn: 至少我以为那是一条木柴。我的天，你把辣椒丢进火里了。我才想呢。

19.en: Maybe I should take a page out of Barton's book. Build Pepper a farm, hope nobody blows it up.
19.cn: 或许我向巴顿学习一下，给佩珀建个农场，但愿没人想炸翻它。
